summary: I was bored and had a few hours to spare, so I made a Khajiit companion.
descriptionHtml: Meraz is a ranger Khajiit with good archery and light armour, his sneak isn\'t that bad either, he wears some of the Theives guild armour, so it won\'t be hard to find something to give him if you want to. He also carries a Skyforge Steel Sword for close quarters combat. He is found at the Bannered mare in Whiterun (not a very original place, eh?)
author: OneVeryColdSergal
